markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Three Actions" />command, envision, Interact ([conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You animate your tattoo guardian, otherwise using the duration and other parameters of a 4th-level [_summon construct_](/Spells.aspx?ID=318) spell. You can have the guardian Fly Free as part of Activating your tattoo. If your tattoo guardian drops to 0 HP, the activation ends, and the inanimate tattoo returns to your skin.
